Dataset: National Centers for Environmental Information Integrated Surface Data (ISD) Dataset
Label: Daily Departure from normal Tempature
Long Name: Daily Average temperature (F) departure from Normal
Short Description: Average Departure from Normal Temperature, on Day
Long Description: Designed to indicate how different today is from “normal” temperature on this date and is reported as difference from average temperature in whole degrees F.    Difference calculated by today’s average temperature versus normal for this date (calculated as average over 1981 – 2010.)

Dataset: National Centers for Environmental Information Integrated Surface Data (ISD) Dataset
Label: Monthly Departure from normal Tempature
Long Name: Monthly Average temperature (F) departure from Normal
Short Description: Average Departure from Normal Temperature, in Month
Long Description: Designed to indicate how different today is from “normal” temperature for this month and is reported as difference from average temperature in whole degrees F.    Difference calculated by today’s average temperature versus normal for this date (calculated as average over 1981 – 2010.)

Dataset: National Centers for Environmental Information Integrated Surface Data (ISD) Dataset
Label: Daily Maximin Temperature
Long Description: Maximum temperature recorded in the day in whole degrees F. (Dry Bulb)

Dataset: National Centers for Environmental Information Integrated Surface Data (ISD) Dataset
Label: Monthly Maximim Temperature
Long Description: Maximum temperature recorded in the month in whole degrees F.(Dry Bulb)

Dataset: National Centers for Environmental Information Integrated Surface Data (ISD) Dataset
Label: Daily Minimum Temperature
Long Description: Minimum temperature recorded in the day in whole degrees F. (Dry Bulb)

Dataset: National Centers for Environmental Information Integrated Surface Data (ISD) Dataset
Label: Monthly Minimum Temperature
Long Description: Minimum temperature  recorded in the month in whole degrees F. (Dry Bulb)

Dataset: National Centers for Environmental Information Integrated Surface Data (ISD) Dataset
Label: Cooling Degree Days - Daily
Long Description: Cooling degree day is a measure  that quantifies the demand for energy needed to cool a building.   It is the number of degrees that a day's average temperature is above 65o Fahrenheit, which is the temperature above which buildings generally need to be cooled.

Dataset: National Centers for Environmental Information Integrated Surface Data (ISD) Dataset
Label: Cooling Degree Days - Monthly Total
Long Description: The Monthly Total sums the Cooling Degree Days measure in total for the month.

Dataset: National Centers for Environmental Information Integrated Surface Data (ISD) Dataset
Label: Cooling Degree Days - Monthly AVG
Long Description: The Monthly Average  reports on the AVERAGE Cooling Degree Days for the month.

Dataset: National Centers for Environmental Information Integrated Surface Data (ISD) Dataset
Label: Heating Degree Days - Daily
Long Description: Heating degree day is a measurement that quantifies the demand for energy needed to heat a building.  It is the number of degrees that a day's average temperature is below 65 Fahrenheit (18 Celsius).

Dataset: National Centers for Environmental Information Integrated Surface Data (ISD) Dataset
Label: Heating Degree Days - Monthly Total
Long Description: The Monthly Total sums the Heating Degree Days measure in total for the month.

Dataset: National Centers for Environmental Information Integrated Surface Data (ISD) Dataset
Label: Heating Degree Days - Monthly AVG
Long Description: The Monthly Average  reports on the AVERAGE Heating Degree Days for the month.

Dataset: National Centers for Environmental Information Integrated Surface Data (ISD) Dataset
Label: Daily Averge Temperature
Long Description: Average Temperature for the day.  Arithmetic average of max and min for the day

Dataset: National Centers for Environmental Information Integrated Surface Data (ISD) Dataset
Label: Monthly Average Temperature
Long Description: Average Temperature for the Month.  Arithmetic average of max and min for the day of the month

Dataset: National Centers for Environmental Information Integrated Surface Data (ISD) Dataset
Label: Daily Precipitation
Long Description: Daily precipitation, Total Liquid Content in inches to hundredths.  T = trace  Blank = none

Dataset: National Centers for Environmental Information Integrated Surface Data (ISD) Dataset
Label: Monthly Precipitation
Long Description: Monthly precipitation, Total Liquid Content in inches to hundredths. T = trace  Blank = none

Dataset: National Centers for Environmental Information Integrated Surface Data (ISD) Dataset
Label: Daily Snowfall
Long Description: Daily snowfall in inches to hundredths.  T = trace  Blank = none

Dataset: National Centers for Environmental Information Integrated Surface Data (ISD) Dataset
Label: Daily Snow Depth
Long Description: Daily reading of snow on the ground in whole inches  T = trace  Blank = none

Dataset: National Centers for Environmental Information Integrated Surface Data (ISD) Dataset
Label: Monthly Total Snowfall
Long Description: Monthly Total Snowfall in inches to hundredths.  T = trace  Blank = none

Dataset: National Centers for Environmental Information Integrated Surface Data (ISD) Dataset
Label: Daily Average Wind Speed
Long Description: Daily average wind speed in miles per hour, to tenths

Dataset: National Centers for Environmental Information Integrated Surface Data (ISD) Dataset
Label: Daily Sustained Wind Speed
Long Description: Maximum sustained Wind speed for the day (whole miles per hour).  Sustained for at least 2 minutes

Dataset: National Centers for Environmental Information Integrated Surface Data (ISD) Dataset
Label: Daily Peak Wind Speed
Long Description: Peak wind speed recorded in whole miles per hour

Dataset: National Centers for Environmental Information Integrated Surface Data (ISD) Dataset
Label: Monthly Average Wind Speed
Long Description: Monthly average wind speed in miles per hour, to tenths

Dataset: National Centers for Environmental Information Integrated Surface Data (ISD) Dataset
Label: Zip Code
Long Description: United States Postal Service Zip Code
